verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

הַחֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh This month הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh This לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh [shall be] unto you the beginning חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> cho-da-Shim; of months רִאשׁ֥וֹן <WH7223> ri-Shon it [shall be] the first הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, לְחָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH2320> le-cha-de-Shei month הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah. of the year

דַּבְּר֗וּ <WH1696> dab-be-Ru, Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat ye unto all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying בֶּעָשֹׂ֖ר <WH6218> be-'a-Sor In the tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh [day] of this month הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; of this וְיִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> ve-yik-Chu they shall take לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish to them every man שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> seh a lamb לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- according to the house אָבֹ֖ת <WH1> 'a-Vot of [their] fathers שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> seh a lamb לַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> lab-Ba-yit. for an house

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- now if יִמְעַ֣ט <WH4591> yim-'At too little הַבַּיִת֮ <WH1004> hab-ba-Yit And if the household מִהְיֹ֣ת <WH1961> mih-Yot be מִשֶּׂה֒ <WH7716> mis-Seh for the lamb וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> ve-la-Kach take ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וּשְׁכֵנ֛וֹ <WH7934> u-she-che-No let him and his neighbour הַקָּרֹ֥ב <WH7138> hak-ka-Ro next אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> bei-To unto his house בְּמִכְסַ֣ת <WH4373> be-mich-Sat [it] according to the number נְפָשֹׁ֑ת <WH5315> ne-fa-Shot; of the souls אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְפִ֣י <WH6310> le-Fi according אָכְל֔וֹ <WH400> a-che-Lo, to his eating תָּכֹ֖סּוּ <WH3699> ta-Chos-su shall make your count עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <WH7716> has-Seh. for the lamb

שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> seh Your lamb תָמִ֛ים <WH8549> ta-Mim shall be without blemish זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> za-Char a male בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> hak-ke-va-Sim [it] out from the sheep וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- from הָעִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> ha-'iz-Zim or from the goats תִּקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> tik-Ka-chu. ye shall take

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְמִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <WH4931> le-mish-Me-ret, And ye shall keep עַ֣ד <WH5704> 'ad until אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> Yom day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh of the same month הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; of the same וְשָׁחֲט֣וּ <WH7819> ve-sha-cha-Tu shall kill אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> kol and the whole קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> ke-Hal assembly עֲדַֽת־ <WH5712> 'a-dat- of the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein it in הָעַרְבָּֽיִם׃ <WH6153> ha-'ar-Ba-yim. the evening

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-ke-Chu And they shall take מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of the blood וְנָֽתְנ֛וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu and strike עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> she-Tei [it] on the two הַמְּזוּזֹ֖ת <WH4201> ham-me-zu-Zot side posts וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and on הַמַּשְׁק֑וֹף <WH4947> ham-mash-Kof; and on the upper door post עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al of הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <WH1004> hab-Bat-Tim, of the houses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> yo-che-Lu wherein they shall eat אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְאָכְל֥וּ <WH398> ve-'a-che-Lu And they shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> hab-ba-Sar the flesh בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> bal-Lay-lah in that night הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; he צְלִי־ <WH6748> tze-li- roast אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh with fire וּמַצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> u-matz-Tzot, and unleavened bread עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and מְרֹרִ֖ים <WH4844> me-ro-Rim [and] with bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <WH398> yo-che-Lu-hu. [herbs] they shall eat

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֹּאכְל֤וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu Eat מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu any נָ֔א <WH4995> Na, not of it raw וּבָשֵׁ֥ל <WH1311> u-va-Shel sodden מְבֻשָּׁ֖ל <WH1310> me-vush-Shal boiled בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; at all with water כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo צְלִי־ <WH6748> tze-li- but roast אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, [with] fire רֹאשׁ֥וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho his head עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along כְּרָעָ֖יו <WH3767> ke-ra-'Av with his legs וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- along קִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> kir-Bo. and with the purtenance

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not תוֹתִ֥ירוּ <WH3498> to-Ti-ru And ye shall let nothing of it remain מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu any עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker; until the morning וְהַנֹּתָ֥ר <WH3498> ve-han-no-Tar and that which remaineth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu any עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker of it until the morning בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh with fire תִּשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <WH8313> tis-Ro-fu. ye shall burn

וְכָכָה֮ <WH3602> ve-cha-Chah And thus תֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu shall ye eat אֹתוֹ֒ <WH853> o-To מָתְנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH4975> ma-te-nei-Chem it [with] your loins חֲגֻרִ֔ים <WH2296> cha-gu-Rim, girded נַֽעֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5275> na-'a-lei-Chem your shoes בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7272> be-rag-lei-Chem, on your feet וּמַקֶּלְכֶ֖ם <WH4731> u-mak-kel-Chem and your staff בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> be-yed-Chem; in your hand וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> va-'a-chal-Tem and ye shall eat אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בְּחִפָּז֔וֹן <WH2649> be-chip-pa-Zon, it in haste פֶּ֥סַח <WH6453> Pe-sach passover ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu it לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. it [is] the LORD'S

וְעָבַרְתִּ֣י <WH5674> ve-'a-var-Ti For I will pass בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> ve-'e-retz- through the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> bal-Lay-lah this night הַזֶּה֒ <WH2088> haz-Zeh he וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <WH5221> ve-hik-kei-Ti and will smite כָל־ <WH3605> chol all בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> be-chOr all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt מֵאָדָ֖ם <WH120> me-'a-Dam both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> be-he-Mah; and beast וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and against all the gods מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh I will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> she-fa-Tim judgment אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will befall הַדָּ֨ם <WH1818> had-Dam And the blood לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem לְאֹ֗ת <WH226> le-'Ot, shall be to you for a token עַ֤ל <WH5921> 'al over הַבָּתִּים֙ <WH1004> hab-bat-Tim upon the houses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, in it וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> ve-ra-'I-ti where ye [are] and when I see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, the blood וּפָסַחְתִּ֖י <WH6452> u-fa-sach-Ti I will pass עֲלֵכֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-le-Chem; over וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and no יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh will befall בָכֶ֥ם va-Chem נֶ֙גֶף֙ <WH5063> ne-gef over you and the plague לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> le-mash-Chit, shall not be upon you to destroy בְּהַכֹּתִ֖י <WH5221> be-hak-ko-Ti [you] when I smite בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom And this day הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh now this לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְזִכָּר֔וֹן <WH2146> le-zik-ka-Ron, shall be unto you for a memorial וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <WH2287> ve-chag-go-Tem and ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To חַ֣ג <WH2282> chag it a feast לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; to the LORD לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, throughout your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> chuk-Kat by an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> o-Lam for ever תְּחָגֻּֽהוּ׃ <WH2287> te-chag-Gu-hu. ye shall keep it a feast

שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> shiv-'At Seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> ya-Mim days מַצּ֣וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot unleavened bread תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu, shall ye eat אַ֚ךְ <WH389> 'ach even בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon, the first תַּשְׁבִּ֥יתוּ <WH7673> tash-Bi-tu ye shall put away שְּׂאֹ֖ר <WH7603> se-'Or leaven מִבָּתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH1004> mib-bat-tei-Chem; out of your houses כִּ֣י׀ <WH3588> ki for כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <WH398> 'o-Chel for whosoever eateth חָמֵ֗ץ <WH2557> cha-Metz, leavened bread וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <WH3772> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> han-Ne-fesh that soul הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> ha-hi-V he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El, off from Israel מִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> mi-Yom day הָרִאשֹׁ֖ן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon from the first עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom day הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I. until the seventh

וּבַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> u-vai-Yom day הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> ha-ri-shOn And in the first מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh, [there shall be] an holy וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> u-vai-yOm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, and in the seventh מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh there shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מְלָאכָה֙ <WH4399> me-la-Chah to you no manner of work לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh shall be done בָהֶ֔ם va-Hem, אַ֚ךְ <WH389> 'ach in them save אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what יֵאָכֵ֣ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel must eat לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol every נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh, [that] which every man ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu that לְבַדּ֖וֹ <WH905> le-vad-Do alone יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh that only may be done לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֮ <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem And ye shall observe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּצּוֹת֒ <WH4682> ham-matz-tzOt [the feast of] unleavened bread כִּ֗י <WH3588> Ki, for בְּעֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> be-'E-tzem for in this selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> ho-Tze-ti have I brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צִבְאוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6635> tziv-'o-tei-Chem your armies מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֞ם <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem therefore shall ye observe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom this day הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1755> le-do-ro-tei-Chem in your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> chuk-Kat by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. for ever

בָּרִאשֹׁ֡ן <WH7223> ba-ri-Shon In the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen י֤וֹם <WH3117> Yom day לַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh of the month בָּעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> ba-'E-rev, at even תֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu ye shall eat מַצֹּ֑ת <WH4682> matz-Tzot; unleavened bread עַ֠ד <WH5704> 'ad until י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom day הָאֶחָ֧ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad until the one וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh of the month בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> ba-'A-rev. at even
